projects.name: Burns Optical's
projects.description: This application was designed using Figma and it's design consist of power glasses ,sunglass ,fancy coolers and which has easy user accessibility. It will be an very much useful application if developed, this works like native application for their own specific brand.

projects.name: Weather Forecasting
projects.description: This Weather Forecasting webpage was developed using the HTML, CSS, JavaScript and with open weather API integration. This application has better user interface and the user experience which will show the current Temperature, Air pressure ,Wind Speed.

projects.name: Employee analysis
projects.description: A full-stack Employee Management System (EMS) project encompasses both the front-end and back-end development of a system designed to manage employee-related tasks and data within an organization. Tech stacks that are used for this project - JavaScript, ReactJs, NodeJs, CSS, MySQL and render for Hosting.

projects.name: Book Keeper (Library Organizer)
projects.description: Library management system project is done with help of React.js, node.js, express.js, MySQL this project was developed to manage and maintain the availability of books, newly updated and also books can be searched using the book ID. This will display all the above features and can be stored in the database.

experiences.description: Completed a 1-month full-stack development internship at Bharat Intern, mastering front-end (HTML/CSS/JavaScript) and back-end (Node.js/Python) technologies. Collaborated on agile projects, designed responsive interfaces, optimized server-side logic, and demonstrated proficiency in problem-solving and debugging for web applications.
